metadata.title: CVE-2024-49990 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/xe/hdcp: Check GSC structure validitySometimes xe_gsc is not initialized when checked at HDCP capabilitycheck. Add gsc structure check to avoid null pointer error.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
